name: Flying Bat Hero Simulator
description:
Robots war has begun in grand city the civilians are under attack of evil robots. It's time to fight back with bat hero as bravest warriors to rescue humanity from enemy robots. Transform your flying bat superhero into bat car which is equipped with modern weapons. Drive, fly, fire and fight to destroy all the robot war cars and rebel robots.

This robot car war game includes superhero flying robot fighting games with new combat skill to demolish monsters alien robots. This flying bat car war simulator is a robot conversion game which contains steel robot transformation into demolition car.
